item.title: Evercore ISI upgrades auto parts stock, saying earnings could get a boost from tariffs
item.description: This auto parts stock may gain even in the face of President Donald Trump's new tariff regime, according to Evercore ISI.

item.title: JPMorgan raises recession odds for this year to 60%
item.description: Tariffs from the Trump administration make a global recession more likely than not, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Stocks with the most to lose as U.S.-China trade war breaks out
item.description: Goldman Sachs screened for stocks with revenue exposure of at least 25% to the Greater China region.

item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages tanked on Thursday, posting their worst session since 2020 after President Trump rolled out a raft of tariffs. What's on CNBC's rad...

item.title: Find safe portfolio income in these assets as the Trump tariff rollout rattles stocks
item.description: Investors shouldn't flee stocks even as the major averages swoon. There are places to find safe yield — depending on a person's goals and timeline.
